body_html: Yeah, I don't think any of the sparse optimizer training ops are implemented on GPU. It would be awesome if someone wanted to do this, though it probably requires either cuda or Eigen programming knowledge to implement.
body_text: Yeah, I don't think any of the sparse optimizer training ops are implemented on GPU.  It would be awesome if someone wanted to do this, though it probably requires either cuda or Eigen programming knowledge to implement.
body: Yeah, I don't think any of the sparse optimizer training ops are implemented on GPU.  It would be awesome if someone wanted to do this, though it probably requires either cuda or Eigen programming knowledge to implement.
